ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Macros Arggggg
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, automated combat seems like an interesting concept.... I would like to do the same with the begging skill... beg.. wait 30 seconds .. beg.. and just
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, automated combat seems like an interesting
concept.... I would like to do the same with the
begging skill... beg.. wait 30 seconds .. beg.. and
just do that till the person kills me.. or in the case
of a pet .. just beg till the pet wishes he could kill
me.


--- Christine <valzog@...> wrote:
> Hello,
> Im trying to make a macro to cast a spell, wait 2
> seconds and cast
> another spell. How do I do this? I cant seem to get
> it to work. Has
> anyone made a macro like this? If so please tell me
> how you did it.
> Thanks
> Christine
>
>
